verses.text: \w He|strong="H8033"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w also|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w Gaza|strong="H5804"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w a|strong="H7200"\w* \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* unto \w her|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w when|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Philistines \w had|strong="H0935"\w* beard \w this|strong="H2008"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w it|strong="H5704"\w* \w was|strong="H3605"\w* noised \w about|strong="H5437"\w* among \w them|strong="H0935"\w*, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* \w was|strong="H3605"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w they|strong="H5704"\w* \w surrounded|strong="H5437"\w* \w him|strong="H0935"\w*, setting guards \w at|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w* \w of|strong="H8179"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* watching \w there|strong="H2008"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* silence, \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w they|strong="H5704"\w* might \w kill|strong="H2026"\w* \w him|strong="H0935"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w went|strong="H0935"\w* \w out|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0834"\w* \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* \w slept|strong="H7901"\w* \w till|strong="H5704"\w* midnight, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w then|strong="H6965"\w* \w rising|strong="H6965"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w took|strong="H5927"\w* \w both|strong="H8147"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w posts|strong="H4201"\w* thereof, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w bolt|strong="H0270"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* laying \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w shoulders|strong="H3802"\w*, \w carried|strong="H5927"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w top|strong="H7218"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w*, \w which|strong="H0834"\w* looketh towards \w Hebron|strong="H2275"\w*.

\w After|strong="H0310"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w* \w he|strong="H0310"\w* \w loved|strong="H0157"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w woman|strong="H0802"\w*, \w who|strong="H0802"\w* dwelt \w in|strong="H0802"\w* \w the|strong="H0310"\w* \w valley|strong="H5158"\w* \w of|strong="H0802"\w* Sorec, \w and|strong="H0802"\w* \w she|strong="H0310"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w called|strong="H8034"\w* Dalila.

\w And|strong="H3967"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* princes \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w came|strong="H5927"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: Deceive \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* learn \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* wherein \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* lieth, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w how|strong="H4100"\w* \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w may|strong="H0376"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w able|strong="H3201"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w overcome|strong="H3201"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w bind|strong="H0631"\w* \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w which|strong="H4100"\w* \w if|strong="H0376"\w* thou shalt \w do|strong="H4100"\w*, \w we|strong="H0587"\w* \w will|strong="H0376"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee \w every|strong="H0376"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* eleven \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* pieces \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1419"\w* Dalila \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w*: \w Tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w beseech|strong="H4994"\w* thee, wherein thy \w greatest|strong="H1419"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* lieth, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w it|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* wherewith if thou wert \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* thou couldst not break loose.

\w And|strong="H0120"\w* \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w*: \w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* cords \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H0259"\w* sinews \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w yet|strong="H3808"\w* \w dry|strong="H2717"\w*, \w but|strong="H0518"\w* \w still|strong="H0559"\w* moist, \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w weak|strong="H3808"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w other|strong="H0259"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6430"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* princes \w of|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w brought|strong="H5927"\w* unto her \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* cords, \w such|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* spoke \w of|strong="H3808"\w*, \w with|strong="H5927"\w* \w which|strong="H0834"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* \w him|strong="H5927"\w*;

\w Men|strong="H0559"\w* \w lying|strong="H0693"\w* privately \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w wait|strong="H0693"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H6430"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w chamber|strong="H2315"\w* expecting \w the|strong="H0853"\w* event \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* thing, \w and|strong="H6430"\w* \w she|strong="H0834"\w* cried \w out|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w are|strong="H0834"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w*. \w And|strong="H6430"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w broke|strong="H5423"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* bands, \w as|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w man|strong="H0784"\w* \w would|strong="H0559"\w* \w break|strong="H5423"\w* \w a|strong="H0834"\w* \w thread|strong="H6616"\w* \w of|strong="H3427"\w* \w tow|strong="H5296"\w* twined \w with|strong="H0413"\w* spittle, \w when|strong="H0834"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* smelleth \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*: \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H0834"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w known|strong="H3045"\w* \w wherein|strong="H0834"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* Jay.

\w And|strong="H1696"\w* Dalila \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Behold|strong="H2009"\w* thou hast \w mocked|strong="H2048"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H1696"\w* hast \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H1696"\w* \w false|strong="H3576"\w* \w thing|strong="H4994"\w*: \w but|strong="H1696"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w at|strong="H0413"\w* least \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* wherewith thou mayest \w be|strong="H4994"\w* \w bound|strong="H0631"\w*.

\w And|strong="H0120"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w*: \w If|strong="H0518"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w new|strong="H2319"\w* \w ropes|strong="H5688"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w were|strong="H0834"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w work|strong="H4399"\w*, \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w weak|strong="H3808"\w* \w and|strong="H0120"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w other|strong="H0259"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w*.

Dalila \w bound|strong="H0631"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* again \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w these|strong="H3947"\w*, \w and|strong="H6430"\w* cried \w out|strong="H5921"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w are|strong="H6430"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w*, \w there|strong="H3427"\w* being \w an|strong="H3947"\w* \w ambush|strong="H0693"\w* \w prepared|strong="H0631"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w chamber|strong="H2315"\w*. \w But|strong="H3947"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w broke|strong="H5423"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* bands \w like|strong="H2220"\w* threads \w of|strong="H3427"\w* webs.

\w And|strong="H7218"\w* Dalila \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w again|strong="H1696"\w*: \w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w long|strong="H5704"\w* dost thou \w deceive|strong="H3576"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w lies|strong="H3576"\w*? Shew \w me|strong="H0413"\w* wherewith thou mayest be \w bound|strong="H0631"\w*. \w And|strong="H7218"\w* \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* \w her|strong="H0413"\w*: \w If|strong="H0518"\w* thou plattest \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w locks|strong="H4253"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w my|strong="H5046"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* lace, \w and|strong="H7218"\w* tying \w them|strong="H0413"\w* round \w about|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H0518"\w* nail fastenest \w it|strong="H0518"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* ground, \w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H4100"\w* be weak.

\w And|strong="H6430"\w* \w when|strong="H5265"\w* Dalila \w had|strong="H6430"\w* done this, she \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w are|strong="H6430"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w*. \w And|strong="H6430"\w* awaking \w out|strong="H5265"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* drew \w out|strong="H5265"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* nail \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* hairs \w and|strong="H6430"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* lace.

\w And|strong="H1419"\w* Dalila \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w How|strong="H4100"\w* dost thou \w say|strong="H0559"\w* thou lovest \w me|strong="H0413"\w*, \w when|strong="H0559"\w* thy \w mind|strong="H3820"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w with|strong="H0854"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*? Thou hast \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* lies \w these|strong="H2088"\w* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w times|strong="H6471"\w*, \w and|strong="H1419"\w* wouldst \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* wherein thy \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* lieth.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w pressed|strong="H6693"\w* \w him|strong="H4191"\w* \w much|strong="H1697"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w continually|strong="H3117"\w* hung \w upon|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H4191"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* many \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, giving \w him|strong="H4191"\w* \w no|strong="H3605"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w rest|strong="H1961"\w*, \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* fainted \w away|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* wearied \w even|strong="H3588"\w* until \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* opening \w the|strong="H3605"\w* truth \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w thing|strong="H3588"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w*: \w The|strong="H3605"\w* razor hath \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* Nazarite, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0430"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w consecrated|strong="H5139"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w mother’s|strong="H0517"\w* \w womb|strong="H0990"\w*: \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* shaven, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w depart|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H5046"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w weak|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w other|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H0120"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0853"\w* \w seeing|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w be|strong="H3820"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* discovered \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w mind|strong="H3820"\w*, \w she|strong="H3588"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* princes \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Come|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w* \w once|strong="H6471"\w* \w more|strong="H6471"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H6471"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w opened|strong="H5927"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*. \w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w went|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w* taking \w with|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w money|strong="H3701"\w* which \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3588"\w* \w promised|strong="H0559"\w*.

\w But|strong="H0376"\w* \w she|strong="H7121"\w* \w made|strong="H7121"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w sleep|strong="H3462"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w knees|strong="H1290"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* lay \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* bosom. \w And|strong="H0376"\w* \w she|strong="H7121"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w a|strong="H7121"\w* barber, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w shaved|strong="H1548"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w locks|strong="H4253"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* \w began|strong="H2490"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* drive \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w away|strong="H5493"\w*, \w and|strong="H0376"\w* thrust \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w*: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* immediately \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \w departed|strong="H5493"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* thee, \w Samson|strong="H8123"\w*. \w And|strong="H3068"\w* awaking \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w mind|strong="H3045"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w did|strong="H3808"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shake|strong="H5287"\w* \w myself|strong="H3045"\w*, \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w knowing|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w was|strong="H3068"\w* \w departed|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H5493"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*.
